mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT reivew, title, writer, review, ref_group, rate, board_review.regdate, profile FROM board_review INNER JOIN users ON board_review.writer=users.id WHERE ref_group=#{ref_group} ORDER BY board_review.regdate desc, num ASC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
SELECT review_num, group_num, writer, content, rate, regdate FROM group_review_tb WHERE group_num=#{num} ORDER BY review_num
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUP_REVIEW_TB (review_num, writer, content, group_num, rate, regdate) VALUES(#{review_num}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{group_num}, #{rate}, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'RR/MM/DD'), 'RR/MM/DD'))
